metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12142 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In ytnef 1.9.2, an invalid memory read vulnerability was found in the function SwapDWord in ytnef.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12142` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.9.3-1
ytnef-tools - 1.9.3-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> the issue resides in ytnefprint/main.c that is not present in trusty.

criterions.comment: libytnef package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.3-1').
